fields.doc: data platform name i.e. hdfs, oracle, espresso
fields.name: platformName
dataPlatformInfo
displayName
fields.doc: The name that will be used for displaying a platform type.

fields.name: type

symbolDocs.FILE_SYSTEM: Value for a file system, e.g. hdfs
symbolDocs.KEY_VALUE_STORE: Value for a key value store, e.g. espresso, voldemort
symbolDocs.MESSAGE_BROKER: Value for a message broker, e.g. kafka
symbolDocs.OBJECT_STORE: Value for an object store, e.g. ambry
symbolDocs.OLAP_DATASTORE: Value for an OLAP datastore, e.g. pinot
symbolDocs.OTHERS: Value for other platforms, e.g salesforce, dovetail
symbolDocs.QUERY_ENGINE: Value for a query engine, e.g. presto
symbolDocs.RELATIONAL_DB: Value for a relational database, e.g. oracle, mysql
symbolDocs.SEARCH_ENGINE: Value for a search engine, e.g seas

fields.doc: Platform type this data platform describes

fields.name: datasetNameDelimiter
fields.doc: The delimiter in the dataset names on the data platform, e.g. '/' for HDFS and '.' for Oracle

fields.name: logoUrl
fields.doc: The URL for a logo associated with the platform
Metadata associated with a dataplatform information

models.name: DataPlatformAspect
models.doc: A union of all supported metadata aspects for a Data Platform

models.name: DataPlatformSnapshot
models.doc: A metadata snapshot for a specific dataplatform entity.

fields.name: urn
fields.doc: URN for the entity the metadata snapshot is associated with.

fields.name: aspects
fields.doc: The list of metadata aspects associated with the data platform. Depending on the use case, this can either be all, or a selection, of supported aspects.

schema.name: dataPlatforms
schema.doc:
Resource provides information about various data platforms.

generated from: com.linkedin.metadata.resources.dataplatform.DataPlatforms

parameters.name: aspects
parameters.doc: list of aspects to be retrieved. Null to retrieve all aspects of the dataPlatforms.

actions.name: getSnapshot
actions.doc:
Get the snapshot of data platform.
Service Returns: Snapshot of data platform with the requested aspects.

parameters.name: aspects
parameters.doc: list of aspects to be returned. null, when all aspects are to be returned.
